page.title: 03The Day I was a Bridesmaid
page.content: {The Headland H/pool By Jayne Gibson} In June 1982 I was a bridesmaid at Valerie and Tony's wedding.Valerie is my Aunt.My dress was white with frills at the bottom and it had 3 pearls at the top.My Auntie Valery's dress was white with a lot of frills at the bottom.There were 3 other bridesmaids who were grown-ups and wore pink dresses.At{St.Hilda's Church}we walked down the aisle to the Vicar.Tony and Valerie had to say{I do.}We then had to{sign the Register}and after that we went to the reception in the car.The bride's car had a big white ribbon at the front.When we got to the reception there was a buffet and then a Disco. After we had something to eat and drink we went home.For their honeymoon they went to the Lakes.We put a ribbon around the car and tied tin cans on the back.
